mapper.update:
UPDATE CMM_PURCHASE_TB SET
BUY_AMOUNT = #{buyAmount},
DONE_PAYMENT_AMOUNT =#{donePaymentAmount},
YET_PAYMENT_AMOUNT=#{yetPaymentAmount},
BUY_TURN =#{buyTurn},
MOD_DT=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') , MOD_TM=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%i%s') , MOD_EMP_KEY=#{modEmpKey} , DELETE_YN='N' WHERE BUY_KEY = #{buyKey}

mapper.select: SELECT PAYMENT_KEY , PAYMENT_BUY_FK_KEY , PAYMENT_STATUS_CD , PAYMENT_TURN , PAYMENT_CALL_DT , PAYMENT_DT , CALL_AMOUNT , CALL_AMOUNT_TAX_YN , PAYMENT_AC_FK_KEY , PAYMENT_ACC_SEQ_FK_KEY , REMARK FROM CMM_PAYMENT_TB WHERE PAYMENT_BUY_FK_KEY = #{buyKey} AND DELETE_YN='N' AND PAYMENT_STATUS_CD NOT IN('PYST3000','PYST4000') ORDER BY PAYMENT_TURN

SELECT PAYMENT_KEY , PAYMENT_BUY_FK_KEY , PAYMENT_STATUS_CD , PAYMENT_TURN , PAYMENT_CALL_DT , PAYMENT_DT , CALL_AMOUNT , CALL_AMOUNT_TAX_YN , PAYMENT_AC_FK_KEY , PAYMENT_ACC_SEQ_FK_KEY , REMARK FROM CMM_PAYMENT_TB WHERE PAYMENT_BUY_FK_KEY = #{paymentBuyFkKey} AND PAYMENT_TURN = #{paymentTurn} AND DELETE_YN='N'

mapper.select: SELECT BL.BILL_NO , BL.BILL_ISSUE_DT , CONCAT((SELECT AD.AC_DIRECTOR_NM FROM CMM_ACCOUNT_DIRECTOR_TB AD WHERE AD.AC_DIRECTOR_KEY = BL.BILL_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY ), ' / ' , (SELECT AD.AC_DIRECTOR_MB_NUM FROM CMM_ACCOUNT_DIRECTOR_TB AD WHERE AD.AC_DIRECTOR_KEY = BL.BILL_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY)) AS BILL_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY , BL.BILL_AMOUNT , BL.BILL_TURN_NO , PM.CALL_AMOUNT , PM.PAYMENT_KEY , PM.CALL_AMOUNT_TAX_YN , PM.PAYMENT_STATUS_CD , PM.PAYMENT_DT , PM.PAYMENT_BUY_FK_KEY , PM.CALL_AMOUNT_TAX_YN FROM CMM_BILLING_TB BL, CMM_PAYMENT_TB PM WHERE PM.PAYMENT_BUY_FK_KEY = #{buyKey} AND PM.PAYMENT_BUY_FK_KEY = BL.BILL_CT_FK_KEY AND PM.BILL_FK_KEY = BL.BILL_NO AND PAYMENT_STATUS_CD IN('PYST3000', 'PYST4000') AND BL.DELETE_YN='N' ORDER BY PM.PAYMENT_TURN
